entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -19.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
